notes:
Appears in every city for a day on completion of [[The Lightbearer]] world event. They wander around the cities of Tibia casting [[Mass Healing]]. They were intended to heal players and did that at first, but because of a change to game mechanics, monsters could no longer work in favor of players. They could, however, heal hostile monsters even on [[Optional PvP]]. This was fixed for [[Lightbearer Event]] in 2014, and Spirits of Light can heal players again. Could be killed by summons on the [[Test Server]].
Looks the same as a [[Wisp]] and a [[Soul Spark]].
name: Spirit of Light
strategy: They cannot be killed. Trap them with parcels and wait untill they heal you.
